data.name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts - STURM BODYGUARD 9 - gun
data.detailed_description:
A tried-and-true sidearm, the Sturm Bodyguard 9 Handgun not only has the best ammo capacity of any pistol, but features a light trigger pull, as well as a secure, hammer-fired, single-action fire control system for the ultimate steady shot.
